questions.question: Which of these is the most important first step in becoming a great salesperson?
options: Build confidence and understand your offer
questions.answer: Build confidence and understand your offer

questions.question: True or False: Listening is more important than talking when closing a sale.
questions.answer: True

questions.question: What does "knowing your client's pain point" help with?
options: Pitching your service as a solution
questions.answer: Pitching your service as a solution

questions.question: Which of these builds trust fastest with a client?
questions.answer: A relevant success story/case study

questions.question: What is the right mindset when entering a sales conversation?
questions.answer: Solve the client's problem

questions.question: What is the best type of business to approach first for website services?
options: Local businesses without a proper website
questions.answer: Local businesses without a proper website

questions.question: True or False: Cold messaging 50 people a day guarantees success.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What makes your pitch stand out in a cold message?
options: Personalizing the message to their business
questions.answer: Personalizing the message to their business

questions.question: What should you never say in your first pitch message?
options: I specialize in local business websites
questions.answer: I'm just getting started

questions.question: If a business ignores your first message, what should you do next?
options: Ask them why they ignored you
questions.answer: Follow up politely after 2–3 days

questions.question: Which of these is usually NOT a concern for local business owners?

questions.answer: To link the website to their revenue or customer base

questions.answer: Contact form with WhatsApp integration

questions.question: True or False: You should always start with free work to gain trust.
questions.answer: False

Show a similar business you helped before

questions.answer: Even better — a website can double that without more effort.

questions.question: What should your tone be when pitching to someone older than you (e.g., 40+ business owner)?
questions.answer: Respectful, confident, and clear

questions.question: Which of these increases your chances of closing a deal?
options: Explaining how your website solves a specific problem
questions.answer: Explaining how your website solves a specific problem

questions.question: A Hunter's success is measured by:
options: How many quality clients they bring in
How long they've been on the platform

questions.question: True or False: Having a script or checklist for your client call improves your chances of success.
questions.answer: True
